Title: Relates to the operation of vehicles on approach of vehicles displaying a blue light
Summary: Relates to the operation of vehicles on approach of vehicles displaying a blue light; requires vehicles to pull over on approach of vehicles displaying a blue light.
LawCode: Amd ยง1144, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the operation of vehicles on approach of vehicles displaying a blue light
